name: Lines 2 by Nestor Yavorskyy
description:
Lines 2 is a Numberlink-based puzzle game involving finding paths to connect colored tiles in a grid.

  • 50 brain-teasing Numberlink puzzles
  • beautiful abstract design, more than 10 color themes
  • 8 ambient relaxing soundtracks
  • 500 achievements
  • 15 Trading Cards, Badge, Emoticons and Backgrounds (Coming soon)
  • Cross-platform saves via Steam Cloud
  • Windows, Mac & Linux
  • First game - Lines
  • Free version - Lines Free
  • Free DLCs with community-generated achievements
